name: Pirate Crossing: The Seven Seas
description:
Animal and a pirate?

Aye!

What's on the other side of the horizon?
Nothing else than more adventures of course!

Crossing the seven seas has never been more fun!
Explore new islands while crossing the paths with your adversaries and your allies alike!

Our anthropomorphic animal friends will make sure to keep you entertained while you become one of the brave adventurous pirates, or witty and composed merchants.

Keep on exploring because the new horizons await your arrival!

Your choices are never set in stone, while you may freely be crossing from merchant to pirate or vice versa in no time.

Reward yourself with a nice filed of cultivated plants on your very own Home Island.

Make sure that you are living a life of comfort by building a nice little home for our favorite teddy bear!
